events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the engineering department for further evaluation considering your software development background.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application and guide you through the recruitment process.
We conducted an initial screening of your engineering skills and experience, and we are pleased to move forward with scheduling a technical interview.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the next steps in the technical interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC, where you will be assessed on your software engineering expertise.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong performance demonstrating your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss your career goals, company culture fit, and employment terms.
You completed the HR interview and impressed our team with your alignment to company values and clear communication.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, reflecting your experience and skills in the industry.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team at our company.
You formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you as a new member of our software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to development tools, documentation, and meeting your new engineering colleagues.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We look forward to your successful contributions as part of the engineering team.
